name: Myth of Manticore Adventure
description:
Myth of Manticore: Gameplay

A dimensional rift in the fabric of time has caused old and new worlds to combine.
The once beautiful mountains were transformed into ancient looking ruins that may still harbor many secrets waiting to be discovered by you, the intrepid explorer. The old world was a peaceful farming community. The new world was too dangerous for farming without defenses and all the farmers eventually perished. In this new world the farms have been taken over by Lost Guardians. They do their best to protect their farms but it's not always easy.  Unfortunately, the new world also includes some less friendly characters, the Kobolds and the (often grumpy) Golems.  The Kobolds and the Golems don't get along but still, they do try to guard animals, when they are not too busy fighting. You can get involved in the conflict as much or as little as you want while also trying to solve the Myth of Manticore.  Be warned though, your every action has a consequence and may or may not result in a suitable outcome.

Can you survive long enough to figure out the "Myth of Manticore" and restore peace in this strange world?

Hardware: 

Windows PC with 8Gb+ Ram and GPU recommended. 

2Gb free disk space.
